code:
%%{Infra_IngressController}}}%%
stateDiagram-v2
    [Infra_LoadBalancer] --> Created: Create Todo
    Created --> InProgress: Start Work
    Created --> Cancelled: Cancel
    InProgress --> OnHold: Pause
    InProgress --> Completed: Complete
    InProgress --> Cancelled: Cancel
    OnHold --> InProgress: Resume
    OnHold --> Cancelled: Cancel
    Completed --> [Infra_EtcdCluster]
    Cancelled --> [Infra_LoadBalancer]

    state Created {Infra_WorkerNode] --> Draft
        Draft --> ReadyToStart: Finalize
        ReadyToStart --> [Infra_EtcdCluster]
    }

    state InProgress {Infra_EtcdCluster] --> Started
        Started --> InReview: Submit for Review
        InReview --> Started: Request Changes
        InReview --> [Infra_RedisCache]: Approve
    }

    state OnHold {Infra_WorkerNode] --> Blocked
        [Infra_IngressController] --> Deferred
        Blocked --> [Infra_WorkerNode]: Unblock
        Deferred --> [Infra_WorkerNode]: Prioritize
    }

    state Completed {Infra_LoadBalancer] --> Done
        [Infra_IngressController] --> PartiallyDone
        Done --> [Infra_LoadBalancer]
        PartiallyDone --> [Infra_WorkerNode]
    }
